answers.answer: I have gotten some degree of swelling in the last trimester with all of my pregnancies.  The swelling in itself doesn't concern me.  I've had swelling this time for about 2 weeks. Mostly in my legs.  They get really heavy and are hard to move.  I also have some aching and stiffness in my hands as well and my rings are tighter.

I am also having some swelling, mainly in my left foot and ankle - talk about looking ridiculous - I look like I have two different legs!  It is worse if I am sitting too long, but it does not necessarily happen everyday.  I also seem to be having some general light swelling in my hands, and I have been noticing that my fingers are sore when I bend them too - I had no idea that this was a symptom of pregnancy so I am glad to hear that you are expereincing something similar.  It must be from swelling around the joints.  Let us know what your doctor says and congrats on finishing at the bar!

A lot of swelling, especially in the lower extremeties is due to the increased pressure on the circulatory system. This is one of the reasons why women suffer for carpal tunnel during pregnancy as well.  Being as I am on pregnancy #8 my ligaments don't hold my uterus up as high as most women and therefore I have a ton of pressure on the nerves and veins below my pelvis.Swelling is something that needs to have a watch kept on it.  Combined with other symptoms such as swelling in the face or protien in the urine it could be a sign of preeclampsia or threatened preeclampsia.  Any time you have swelling you should mention it to your OB just so they can keep an eye on it and watch for other symptoms.  Swelling on it's own however is not usually an indication of something being wrong.

I took my rings off a few months ago just in case. I didn't want to w ake up one morning and have them cutting off my cerculation. I tried to put one on last night to see how swollen my fingers were. I could only get it just past my first knuckle.My knuckles are hurting so bad. It hurts to grip a glass and drink. Lifting anything right now is a pain. I'm glad I only have 7 more weeks.

im just about 29 weeks and so far so good....everyday i take off my engagement ring and put it back on to check for finger swellign and its still sliding off and on so i guess thats good...i have always had low blood pressure so im not too worriedi do know 6 years ago with my son i had a terrible time at the end with water weight....it was very painful and my legs and feet would go numb from the retention of all the water...not to mention my preg weight skyrocketed from thishope your doc is able to give you some answers
I had such severe swelling with pregnancy #3 that afterwards the doc put me on a diuretic and I  LITERALLY lost 25 lbs in a weeks time.  Boy was I in the bathroom a LOT that week!!!

I have been having swelling in my feet and ankles. I think it has to do with this heat wave Toronto is getting, and add the humidity to it and OMG its bad.  My rings still slip off easily so I think it is just the heat right now.
Well I see the Dr in the morning we'll see what he says about my swelling.
I've been getting a fair bit of swelling in my legs and feet which really suck, but nowhere else in my body. I also noticed I'm starting to waddle rofl

I've had swelling as well. I went camping and it was very hot. I tried to stay as hydrated as possible but it was hard in the heat. After that, my feet were pretty swollen and they hurt to walk on them, it felt very strange to walk on them as well. I'm trying to make sure I keep them up as much as I can, and not to stand for too long. Putting my feet up is hard though since I have a 2 year old to keep an eye on all day long!!!

question: Who is experiencing swelling?  I noticed last Thursday my toes hurt to bend and when I took my flip flops off I noticed that I had marks on my feet from the straps. I soaked my feet in an Epsom salt bath and went to bed. By morning my feet were fine and I noticed that when I put my flip flops back on they were loose but about two hours later they were tight on my feet and my feet were tingling.Every day since I have had tingling in my feet and sometimes I look at them and there purple. My ankles aren't swelling just my feet. I've been doing epsom salt baths every night in my foot spa with massage.I've also had pain in my fingers when I bend them the joints hurt. I think I'm gonna call my Dr tomorrow.I've been keeping my feet elevated any time I am sitting. I'm so glad that Friday was my last shift at the bar I guess I timed that just right.
title: Swelling
